description: This is a React component named 'Home' that functions as a page displaying recipe search functionality with filters, a sidebar, and a recipe list. It manages state for filters, recipes, and loading status, and fetches recipes from an external API upon filter changes. It also composes other components such as Sidebar and RecipeList.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Asynchronously fetches recipes based on provided filters, manages loading state.
